title: A sermon preached before the King at Whitehall, on the second of December, 1697 being the day of thanksgiving for the peace / by Gilbert, Lord Bishop of Sarum.
author: Burnet, Gilbert, 1643-1715.
publisher: Re-printed by the heirs and successors of Andrew Anderson,
